Edges-Assassin -- Female Human Heroic Assassin
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d10 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Skills (26 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4-2 Science: (sma) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Language (Common): (sma) d8 Shooting: (agi) d8
Battle: (sma) d8 Notice: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d6
Boating: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Taunt: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Thievery: (agi) d6
Fighting: (agi) d8 Riding: (agi) d4
Languages: Common; Draconic; Dwarven; Infernal
Skill Notes:
Mild Mannered: -2 Intimidation
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Gorum (Neutral)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 4; Skill: 14
Features
Edges (4 points): Assassin II; Assassin III; Assassin; Rogue Hindrances: Can't Swim; Jealous; Mild Mannered; Ruthless Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Assassin II: Has Hide In Plain Sight and Resistance To Poison features
Assassin III: May use Angel Of Death and Swift Death features 1/dy
Assassin: Has Death Attack feature
Rogue: Has Armor Restriction and Sneak Attack features
Jealous: Has focused envy about one topic or person
Combat
Parry: 6 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: None Weapons: Short Spear (d6+d6 R4"); Sling (d6+d4 R4"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Angel Of Death: May disintegrate slain victim
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
Death Attack: Wounding attack with The Drop kills (Vigor neg); incapacitating attack is silent
Resistance To Poison: +4 to resist poison
Ruthless: Attacks those opposing personal goal
Sneak Attack: Successful attack with The Drop or on Vulnerable foe inflicts +d6 damage
Swift Death: May attack aware foe w/The Drop
Arcana
Arcana Notes: Hide In Plain Sight: May become invisible at will when immobile
